commit.message:
bump syntex_* to 0.58

Signed-off-by: Igor Gnatenko <ignatenko@redhat.com>

files.patch:
@@ -23,8 +23,8 @@ regex = "0.2"
 term = "0.4"
 strings = "0.0.1"
 diff = "0.1"
-syntex_syntax = "0.56"
-syntex_errors = "0.56"
+syntex_syntax = "0.58"
+syntex_errors = "0.58"
 log = "0.3"
 env_logger = "0.4"
 getopts = "0.2"
